Class IdtIbatisDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.nv.db.AbstractIbatisDao
      modules.idt.IdtIbatisDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommonDao, IdtDao
 class IdtIbatisDaoImpl
extends AbstractIbatisDao
implements IdtDao

This is the iBatis implementation of IdtDao interface for IDT Administration data store.

rterrell
